steps.name: User navigates to the 'Trading Terms' section

source: ^User selects the Collection Type as 'Cheque' only & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following value as 'Cheque'$

steps.name: User selects the Collection Type as 'Cheque' only & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following value as 'Cheque'

source: ^User navigates to the 'LOV' tab & selects the LOV type as 'User'$

steps.name: User navigates to the 'LOV' tab & selects the LOV type as 'User'

source: ^The User should be successfully logged into the Application$

steps.name: The User should be successfully logged into the Application

source: ^User verifies the following values are defined under the new LOV - Cash, Cheque, MMP, EFT$

steps.name: User verifies the following values are defined under the new LOV - Cash, Cheque, MMP, EFT

source: ^User selects the Collection Type as 'Deferred Cheque' & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following values as 'Cash', 'Cheque', 'MMP' & 'EFT'\.$

steps.name: User selects the Collection Type as 'Deferred Cheque' & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following values as 'Cash', 'Cheque', 'MMP' & 'EFT'.

source: ^User verifies when the Set Code for the LOV is entered as 'PPM' then the Set Name is displayed as 'Preferred Payment Method'\.$

steps.name: User verifies when the Set Code for the LOV is entered as 'PPM' then the Set Name is displayed as 'Preferred Payment Method'.

source: ^User clicks on the Data Entry & selects any available customer where Customer type = Outlet & navigates to the profile tab$

steps.name: User clicks on the Data Entry & selects any available customer where Customer type = Outlet & navigates to the profile tab
User Provides the valid Admin credentials

source: ^User verifies the dropdown field named 'Preferred Payment Mode' is displayed$

steps.name: User verifies the dropdown field named 'Preferred Payment Mode' is displayed

source: ^User selects the Collection Type as 'Cash & Cheque' & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following values as 'Cash', 'Cheque' & 'MMP'$

steps.name: User selects the Collection Type as 'Cash & Cheque' & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following values as 'Cash', 'Cheque' & 'MMP'
User clicks on the set code 'PPM'

source: ^The User should be navigated to configuration screen successfully$

steps.name: The User should be navigated to configuration screen successfully

source: ^User selects the Collection Type as 'Cash' & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following values as 'Cash' & 'MMP'$

steps.name: User selects the Collection Type as 'Cash' & verifies the Preferred Payment Mode dropdown field auto-populates the following values as 'Cash' & 'MMP'
